name: Richard A. Davis
title: Software Engineer
summary: I'm a Software Engineer with 8+ years experience building Web Applications for Startups and Government Agencies. After taking some time away from my career to focus on my health, I'm ready to get back to work.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Contributed to a Web Application that tracks and reports network upgrades.
Introduced the team to Automated Testing and CI/CD.
Managed a private GitLab instance to build, test, and deploy application containers.
Wrote Dockerfiles to define application containers utilizing the multi-stage build syntax.
Used Docker Compose to define a local development environment.
Wrote system tests for user workflows.
Utilized Chef InSpec to audit configuration changes.
Created a template for HTML and CSS formatted emails
